name: Groupingplugin
tagline: A Minecraft-Plugin to create and handle private Groups
body:
### Welcome to the Groupingplugin Page
The Groupingplugin-Plugin allows Players on the server to create and manage Groups. Inside groups XP will be shared and in Combination with my other plugins you can recieve and solve Quests together and even play with different classes to enjoy Buffs for the whole group.

### Easy to use
Simply create a group and invite a friend to join you and you're ready to go

### MMORPG-like Adventure
In Combination with my other Plugins you can expirience a whole new adventure in Minecraft to play and quest with your friends. 

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
